summary: Experienced Senior Automotive Android Developer with 4+ years of expertise in AOSP customization, embedded systems, and vehicle integration. Proven track record of delivering production-ready automotive software solutions deployed in 100,000+ vehicles worldwide. Specialized in Android Automotive OS, embedded Linux, and real-time systems development.

experience.description: Leading automotive Android development initiatives for next-generation vehicle platforms
achievements: Developed custom AOSP builds for automotive ECUs with 40% performance improvement
Implemented Vehicle HAL integration supporting 50+ vehicle parameters
Led team of 5 developers in delivering production-ready IVI systems
Achieved ISO 26262 ASIL-B compliance for safety-critical components
Reduced boot time from 45s to 12s through system optimization

experience.description: Specialized in automotive Android applications and embedded system integration
achievements: Implemented OBD-II protocol integration with 99.9% accuracy
Created custom UI components for automotive displays
Optimized memory usage by 35% for resource-constrained environments
Delivered 8 production applications for automotive clients

experience.description: Focused on embedded Linux development and automotive system integration
achievements: Developed device drivers for automotive sensors
Achieved <5ms response time for safety-critical functions
Collaborated with international teams across 3 time zones
